content.rendered:
Shabiki Review

When we talk about simplicity with regards to betting sites, Shabiki.com is as simple as they come. This betting site is arguably the easiest to navigate around, especially given the fact that not many matches are offered. All the bets offered on this site are part of a jackpot. There are different jackpots offered on this site and the amount to be won on each jackpot is substantially high. 

Shabiki.com at a glance.

Markets Offered – 4/10

Ease of Use – 5/10

Easy Jackpot – 5/10

Features – 6/10

Summary

What makes Shabiki.com a good betting site is majorly the fact that it allows you to take part in jackpot competitions with minimum stake. It also allows you to navigate the betting site with ease and has a number of additional features. It, however, does not offer live matches, casinos or any other sports bet option.

OVERALL

5/10

Pros

Easy to bet

Fair pricing of bets

A user-friendly website that is easy to navigate

Simple registration procedure

Daily Jackpot

User-friendly website

Adequate advertising

Easy deposits and winning through Mpesa

Reasonably small betting amounts.

Cons

Limited betting options

No live betting

No virtual games

No casino

Learn more about Premier Bet Kenya

Shabiki Jackpot Mbao (SJM).

This is a jackpot option that allows you to place a bet with a minimum of Ksh 20. From the name itself, you can easily come to the conclusion that it is a jackpot option that is widely popular. This is a fun jackpot event that gives you the option of either making your own bet slip or letting the system automatically select teams on your behalf.

The AUTO bet option is widely regarded as a speculative betting option given that you have no say on the choices made. Given that gamblers rarely make the right selections, the AUTObet is a widely preferred option.  The OWNBET option, on the other hand, allows you to make your own selection. Here you have full freedom of choosing the teams you want as such, you can be able to do extensive research and increase the probability of you winning.

In order for you to take part in this jackpot competition, all you have to do is choose 10 different outcomes from 10 different matches and await the final result. The grand prize that stands to be won is Ksh 20,000,000.  This cash prize is subject to change, depending on whether accurate predictions are made or not. When there are no accurate predictions made and consequently no winners, the total amount of money that stands to be won tends to increase. 

Get the best betting tips and win big

Shabiki Power 13.

Shabiki Power 13 is composed of two jackpot events. Here, there is a weekend jackpot to be won and also a mid-week one. In order to become a winner of either of these two events, all you have to do is make 13 correct predictions on these respective events. Making 13 corrects jackpot predictions sees to it that you walk away with a grand prize of ish 20,000,000. There are bonuses to be won by those who make 12 or 11 accurate predictions.

Taking part in this jackpot competition can be done in two ways. You can either bet using SMS or you can attempt betting online through their website. Like in Shabiki jackpot mbao, you have the option of either choosing an AUTObet option or OWNBET option.

FAQs .

What is shabiki’s Paybill number?

Their paybill number is 290063.

How can I get in touch with Shabiki’s customer care?

This company has a dedicated team of customer care agents who are competent enough to meet all your needs. You can reach them on

 0703163163 / 0709433000 or on their email

 help@shabiki.com

How can I Join shabiki.com .

All you have to do is SMS the word JOIN to 29063.
